headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Prize Ride Challenge
content:
See that sweet custom car sitting on the back of the LS Customs Slamtruck? It’s yours – if you’re driver enough. LS Car Meet Members who complete the exclusive Prize Ride Challenge will win themselves a brand-new set of wheels, with new prizes regularly dropped by Los Santos Customs.

Check out the LS Car Meet section of the Interaction Menu to see today’s task. Why pay for your wheels when you can win them?
